output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, it contains "CUI mandatar financiar coordonator: 11240017"
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions Marcel Ciolacu, who is a presidential candidate
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram reaching 10,000-15,000 impressions
4. Electoral objective: Yes, clear electoral intent: - Explicitly asks for votes ("Votul tău contează") - Promotes both parliamentary and presidential campaigns - Uses electoral slogans and promises
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content
6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official party communication from PSD Gorj with clear campaign messaging
Key concerns: - This post promotes Marcel Ciolacu for the presidential election after the campaign period has ended - While the parliamentary campaign is still valid, the presidential promotion is not allowed at this time - The message actively seeks to influence voters for both elections

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Official party communication with mandatar financiar - Direct candidate mention - Clear call to action for voting - Paid distribution - Electoral promises and messaging
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Gorj, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj electoral platit pe Facebook (ID: 1068055818117576) care sustine explicit candidatura lui Marcel Ciolacu la presedintie ("Marcel Ciolacu pentru Președinția României"), dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, perioada in care campania electorala pentru alegerile prezidentiale este inchisa. Mesajul include un indemn explicit la vot ("Votul tău contează") si promisiuni electorale, fiind distribuit ca reclama platita pe Facebook si Instagram, cu un impact estimat intre 10,000 si 15,000 de afisari.
